Content:
## Quickstart

Make sure that you have `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` exported in your environment or in a .env file in the root of the project. You can get an API key by signing up at the [Anthropic Console keys page](https://console.anthropic.com/settings/keys).

Simple use case that spawns an interactive chat prompt with the filesystem MCP server from CLI:
Translation:
## Mulai Cepat

Pastikan bahwa Anda telah mengekspor `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` di lingkungan Anda atau di file .env pada root proyek. Anda dapat memperoleh API key dengan mendaftar di [halaman kunci Anthropic Console](https://console.anthropic.com/settings/keys).

Contoh penggunaan sederhana yang memunculkan prompt chat interaktif dengan server MCP filesystem dari CLI:

RowTranslations.originContent: Make sure that you have `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` exported in your environment or in a .env file in the root of the project. You can get an API key by signing up at the [Anthropic Console keys page](https://console.anthropic.com/settings/keys).
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Pastikan bahwa Anda telah mengekspor `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` di lingkungan Anda atau di file .env pada root proyek. Anda dapat memperoleh API key dengan mendaftar di [halaman kunci Anthropic Console](https://console.anthropic.com/settings/keys).

RowTranslations.originContent: Simple use case that spawns an interactive chat prompt with the filesystem MCP server from CLI:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Contoh penggunaan sederhana yang memunculkan prompt chat interaktif dengan server MCP filesystem dari CLI:

Content:
```shell
npx mcp-chat --server "npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-filesystem /Users/$USER/Desktop"
```
Translation:
```shell
npx mcp-chat --server "npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-filesystem /Users/$USER/Desktop"
```

Content:
This will open up a chat prompt that you can use to interact with the servers and chat with an LLM.

## Config

You can also just specify your claude_desktop_config.json (Mac):
Translation:
Ini akan membuka prompt obrolan yang dapat Anda gunakan untuk berinteraksi dengan server dan mengobrol dengan LLM.

## Konfigurasi

Anda juga dapat langsung menentukan claude_desktop_config.json Anda (Mac):

RowTranslations.originContent: This will open up a chat prompt that you can use to interact with the servers and chat with an LLM.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Ini akan membuka prompt obrolan yang dapat Anda gunakan untuk berinteraksi dengan server dan mengobrol dengan LLM.

RowTranslations.originContent: You can also just specify your claude_desktop_config.json (Mac):
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Anda juga dapat langsung menentukan claude_desktop_config.json Anda (Mac):

Content:
```shell
npx mcp-chat --config "~/Library/Application Support/Claude/claude_desktop_config.json"
```
Translation:
```shell
npx mcp-chat --config "~/Library/Application Support/Claude/claude_desktop_config.json"
```

Content: Or (Windows):
Translation: Atau (Windows):

Content:
```shell
npx mcp-chat --config "%APPDATA%\Claude\claude_desktop_config.json"
```
Translation:
```shell
npx mcp-chat --config "%APPDATA%\Claude\claude_desktop_config.json"
```

Content:
## Web mode

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b7e8a648-8084-4955-8cdf-fc6eb141572e

You can also run mcp-chat in web mode by specifying the `--web` flag (make sure to have `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` exported in your environment):
Translation:
## Web mode

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b7e8a648-8084-4955-8cdf-fc6eb141572e

You can also run mcp-chat in web mode by specifying the `--web` flag (make sure to have `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` exported in your environment):

RowTranslations.originContent: You can also run mcp-chat in web mode by specifying the `--web` flag (make sure to have `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` exported in your environment):
RowTranslations.translatedContent: You can also run mcp-chat in web mode by specifying the `--web` flag (make sure to have `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` exported in your environment):

Content:
```shell
npx mcp-chat --web
```
Translation:
```shell
npx mcp-chat --web
```

Content:
In web mode, you can start new chats, send messages to the model, and dynamically configure the mcp servers via the UI - no need to specify on the command line. In addition, chats created via the Web UI are saved to ~/.mcpchats/chats just like chats created via the CLI.

## Features

- [x] Run via CLI in interactive mode or directly pass prompts with `-p`
- [x] Web mode to chat with models via a web interface `--web`
- [x] Connect to any MCP server (JS, Python, Docker) in production or during development
- [x] Choose between models with `-m`
- [x] Customize system prompt with `--system`
- [x] Saves chat history with settings in `~/.mcpchat/chats` including web chats
- [x] Save and restore commands in `~/.mcpchat/history`
- [x] View tool call output and arguments directly in chat to help debug mcp servers

## CLI Usage

Run prompts via CLI with the `-p` flag:
Translation:
Dalam mode web, Anda dapat memulai obrolan baru, mengirim pesan ke model, dan mengonfigurasi server mcp secara dinamis melalui UI - tidak perlu menentukan melalui command line. Selain itu, obrolan yang dibuat melalui Web UI akan disimpan di ~/.mcpchats/chats sama seperti obrolan yang dibuat melalui CLI.

## Fitur

- [x] Jalankan melalui CLI dalam mode interaktif atau langsung kirim prompt dengan `-p`
- [x] Mode web untuk mengobrol dengan model melalui antarmuka web `--web`
- [x] Terhubung ke server MCP apa pun (JS, Python, Docker) di produksi atau selama pengembangan
- [x] Pilih model dengan `-m`
- [x] Kustomisasi prompt sistem dengan `--system`
- [x] Menyimpan riwayat obrolan beserta pengaturan di `~/.mcpchat/chats` termasuk obrolan web
- [x] Simpan dan pulihkan perintah di `~/.mcpchat/history`
- [x] Lihat output dan argumen tool call langsung di obrolan untuk membantu debug server mcp

## Penggunaan CLI

Jalankan prompt melalui CLI dengan flag `-p`:

RowTranslations.originContent: In web mode, you can start new chats, send messages to the model, and dynamically configure the mcp servers via the UI - no need to specify on the command line. In addition, chats created via the Web UI are saved to ~/.mcpchats/chats just like chats created via the CLI.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Dalam mode web, Anda dapat memulai obrolan baru, mengirim pesan ke model, dan mengonfigurasi server mcp secara dinamis melalui UI - tidak perlu menentukan melalui command line. Selain itu, obrolan yang dibuat melalui Web UI akan disimpan di ~/.mcpchats/chats sama seperti obrolan yang dibuat melalui CLI.

RowTranslations.originContent: - [x] Web mode to chat with models via a web interface `--web`
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - [x] Mode web untuk mengobrol dengan model melalui antarmuka web `--web`

RowTranslations.originContent: - [x] Connect to any MCP server (JS, Python, Docker) in production or during development
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - [x] Terhubung ke server MCP apa pun (JS, Python, Docker) di produksi atau selama pengembangan

RowTranslations.originContent: - [x] Saves chat history with settings in `~/.mcpchat/chats` including web chats
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - [x] Menyimpan riwayat obrolan beserta pengaturan di `~/.mcpchat/chats` termasuk obrolan web

RowTranslations.originContent: - [x] View tool call output and arguments directly in chat to help debug mcp servers
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - [x] Lihat output dan argumen tool call langsung di obrolan untuk membantu debug server mcp

RowTranslations.originContent: Run prompts via CLI with the `-p` flag:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Jalankan prompt melalui CLI dengan flag `-p`:

Content:
```shell
npx mcp-chat --server "npx mcp-server-kubernetes" -p "List the pods in the default namespace"
```
Translation:
```shell

```

RowTranslations.originContent: npx mcp-chat --server "npx mcp-server-kubernetes" -p "List the pods in the default namespace"
RowTranslations.translatedContent: npx mcp-chat --server "npx mcp-server-kubernetes" -p "List the pods in the default namespace"

Content:
This runs the prompt with the kubenertes mcp-server & exits after the response is received on stdout.

Choose a model to chat with via CLI with the `-m` flag:
Translation:
Ini menjalankan prompt dengan kubernetes mcp-server & keluar setelah respons diterima di stdout.

Pilih model untuk mengobrol melalui CLI dengan flag `-m`:

RowTranslations.originContent: This runs the prompt with the kubenertes mcp-server & exits after the response is received on stdout.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Ini menjalankan prompt dengan kubernetes mcp-server & keluar setelah respons diterima di stdout.

RowTranslations.originContent: Choose a model to chat with via CLI with the `-m` flag:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Pilih model untuk mengobrol melalui CLI dengan flag `-m`:

Content:
```shell
npx mcp-chat --server "npx mcp-server-kubernetes" -m "claude-3.5"
```
Translation:
```shell
npx mcp-chat --server "npx mcp-server-kubernetes" -m "claude-3.5"
```

Content:
Uses the model `claude-3.5` to chat with. Note that currently only Anthropic models are supported.

Custom system prompt:

`--system` flag can be used to specify a system prompt:
Translation:
Menggunakan model `claude-3.5` untuk melakukan percakapan. Perlu dicatat bahwa saat ini hanya model Anthropic yang didukung.

Prompt sistem khusus:

Flag `--system` dapat digunakan untuk menentukan prompt sistem:

RowTranslations.originContent: Uses the model `claude-3.5` to chat with. Note that currently only Anthropic models are supported.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Menggunakan model `claude-3.5` untuk melakukan percakapan. Perlu dicatat bahwa saat ini hanya model Anthropic yang didukung.

RowTranslations.originContent: `--system` flag can be used to specify a system prompt:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Flag `--system` dapat digunakan untuk menentukan prompt sistem:

Content:
```shell
npx mcp-chat --system "Explain the output to the user in pirate speak." --server "npx mcp-server-kubernetes" -p "List the pods in the default namespace"
```
Translation:
```shell
npx mcp-chat --system "Explain the output to the user in pirate speak." --server "npx mcp-server-kubernetes" -p "List the pods in the default namespace"
```

RowTranslations.originContent: npx mcp-chat --system "Explain the output to the user in pirate speak." --server "npx mcp-server-kubernetes" -p "List the pods in the default namespace"
RowTranslations.translatedContent: npx mcp-chat --system "Explain the output to the user in pirate speak." --server "npx mcp-server-kubernetes" -p "List the pods in the default namespace"

Content:
## ENV vars

Mcp-chat supports passing through env vars to mcp servers. This is not standardized in the mcp spec though and other clients may not do this with dynamic env var values - read more [here](https://github.com/Flux159/mcp-server-kubernetes/issues/148#issuecomment-2950181666) about standard stdio mcp clients.
Translation:
## Variabel ENV

Mcp-chat mendukung penerusan variabel lingkungan (env vars) ke server mcp. Namun, ini tidak distandarisasi dalam spesifikasi mcp dan klien lain mungkin tidak melakukan ini dengan nilai variabel lingkungan yang dinamis - baca lebih lanjut [di sini](https://github.com/Flux159/mcp-server-kubernetes/issues/148#issuecomment-2950181666) tentang klien mcp stdio standar.

RowTranslations.originContent: Mcp-chat supports passing through env vars to mcp servers. This is not standardized in the mcp spec though and other clients may not do this with dynamic env var values - read more [here](https://github.com/Flux159/mcp-server-kubernetes/issues/148#issuecomment-2950181666) about standard stdio mcp clients.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Mcp-chat mendukung penerusan variabel lingkungan (env vars) ke server mcp. Namun, ini tidak distandarisasi dalam spesifikasi mcp dan klien lain mungkin tidak melakukan ini dengan nilai variabel lingkungan yang dinamis - baca lebih lanjut [di sini](https://github.com/Flux159/mcp-server-kubernetes/issues/148#issuecomment-2950181666) tentang klien mcp stdio standar.

Content:
```shell
KUBECONFIG="~/.kube/config" npx mcp-chat --server "npx mcp-server-kubernetes"
```
Translation:
```shell
KUBECONFIG="~/.kube/config" npx mcp-chat --server "npx mcp-server-kubernetes"
```

Content:
## For developers of mcp-servers

You can pass in a local build of a python or node mcp-server to test it out with mcp-chat:

Node JS:
Translation:
## Untuk pengembang mcp-servers

Anda dapat memasukkan build lokal dari python atau node mcp-server untuk mengujinya dengan mcp-chat:

Node JS:

RowTranslations.originContent: You can pass in a local build of a python or node mcp-server to test it out with mcp-chat:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Anda dapat memasukkan build lokal dari python atau node mcp-server untuk mengujinya dengan mcp-chat:

Content:
```shell
# Directly executing built script
npx mcp-chat --server "/path/to/mcp-server-kubernetes/dist/index.js"
# Using node / bun
npx mcp-chat --server "node /path/to/mcp-server-kubernetes/dist/index.js"
```
Translation:
```shell
# Directly executing built script
npx mcp-chat --server "/path/to/mcp-server-kubernetes/dist/index.js"
# Using node / bun
npx mcp-chat --server "node /path/to/mcp-server-kubernetes/dist/index.js"
```

Content: Python:
Translation: Python:

Content:
```shell
# Python: Using uv
npx mcp-chat --server "uv --directory /path/to/mcp-server-weather/ run weather.py"
# Using python / python3 - make sure to run in venv or install deps globally
npx mcp-chat --server "/path/to/mcp-server-weather/weather.py"
```
Translation:
```shell
# Python: Using uv
npx mcp-chat --server "uv --directory /path/to/mcp-server-weather/ run weather.py"
# Using python / python3 - make sure to run in venv or install deps globally
npx mcp-chat --server "/path/to/mcp-server-weather/weather.py"
```

RowTranslations.originContent: # Using python / python3 - make sure to run in venv or install deps globally
RowTranslations.translatedContent: # Using python / python3 - make sure to run in venv or install deps globally

Content:
## Development

Install dependencies & run the CLI:
Translation:
## Pengembangan

Instal dependensi & jalankan CLI:

Content:
```shell
git clone https://github.com/Flux159/mcp-chat
bun install
bun run dev
```
Translation:
```shell
git clone https://github.com/Flux159/mcp-chat
bun install
bun run dev
```

Content: To develop mcp-chat while connecting to an mcp-server, make a build & run the CLI with the server flag:
Translation: Untuk mengembangkan mcp-chat sambil terhubung ke mcp-server, buatlah build & jalankan CLI dengan flag server:

RowTranslations.translatedContent: Untuk mengembangkan mcp-chat sambil terhubung ke mcp-server, buatlah build & jalankan CLI dengan flag server:

RowTranslations.originContent: To develop mcp-chat while connecting to an mcp-server, make a build & run the CLI with the server flag:

Content:
```shell
npm run build && node dist/index.js --server "npx mcp-server-kubernetes" -p "List the pods in the default namespace"
```
Translation:
```shell
npm run build && node dist/index.js --server "npx mcp-server-kubernetes" -p "List the pods in the default namespace"
```

RowTranslations.originContent: npm run build && node dist/index.js --server "npx mcp-server-kubernetes" -p "List the pods in the default namespace"
RowTranslations.translatedContent: npm run build && node dist/index.js --server "npx mcp-server-kubernetes" -p "List the pods in the default namespace"

Content:
## Publishing new release

Go to the [releases](https://github.com/Flux159/mcp-chat/releases) page, click on "Draft New Release", click "Choose a tag" and create a new tag by typing out a new version number using "v{major}.{minor}.{patch}" semver format. Then, write a release title "Release v{major}.{minor}.{patch}" and description / changelog if necessary and click "Publish Release".

This will create a new tag which will trigger a new release build via the cd.yml workflow. Once successful, the new release will be published to npm. Note that there is no need to update the package.json version manually, as the workflow will automatically update the version number in the package.json file & push a commit to main.

## License

[MIT License](https://github.com/Flux159/mcp-chat/blob/main/LICENSE)
Translation:
## Mempublikasikan rilis baru

Buka halaman [rilis](https://github.com/Flux159/mcp-chat/releases), klik "Draft New Release", klik "Choose a tag" dan buat tag baru dengan mengetik nomor versi baru menggunakan format semver "v{major}.{minor}.{patch}". Kemudian, tulis judul rilis "Release v{major}.{minor}.{patch}" dan deskripsi / changelog jika perlu lalu klik "Publish Release".

Ini akan membuat tag baru yang akan memicu pembuatan rilis baru melalui workflow cd.yml. Setelah berhasil, rilis baru akan dipublikasikan ke npm. Perlu dicatat bahwa tidak perlu memperbarui versi package.json secara manual, karena workflow akan otomatis memperbarui nomor versi di file package.json & mendorong commit ke main.

## Lisensi

[Lisensi MIT](https://github.com/Flux159/mcp-chat/blob/main/LICENSE)

RowTranslations.originContent: Go to the [releases](https://github.com/Flux159/mcp-chat/releases) page, click on "Draft New Release", click "Choose a tag" and create a new tag by typing out a new version number using "v{major}.{minor}.{patch}" semver format. Then, write a release title "Release v{major}.{minor}.{patch}" and description / changelog if necessary and click "Publish Release".
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Buka halaman [rilis](https://github.com/Flux159/mcp-chat/releases), klik "Draft New Release", klik "Choose a tag" dan buat tag baru dengan mengetik nomor versi baru menggunakan format semver "v{major}.{minor}.{patch}". Kemudian, tulis judul rilis "Release v{major}.{minor}.{patch}" dan deskripsi / changelog jika perlu lalu klik "Publish Release".

RowTranslations.originContent: This will create a new tag which will trigger a new release build via the cd.yml workflow. Once successful, the new release will be published to npm. Note that there is no need to update the package.json version manually, as the workflow will automatically update the version number in the package.json file & push a commit to main.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Ini akan membuat tag baru yang akan memicu pembuatan rilis baru melalui workflow cd.yml. Setelah berhasil, rilis baru akan dipublikasikan ke npm. Perlu dicatat bahwa tidak perlu memperbarui versi package.json secara manual, karena workflow akan otomatis memperbarui nomor versi di file package.json & mendorong commit ke main.
